ValidationRule.description: if quote status is activated then effective date, expiry date,quote term should not be equal null.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Activated") , ISNULL( Quote_Effective_Date__c ), ISNULL( Quote_Expiry_Date__c ), ISNULL( Quote_Term__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Quote Effective Date, Quote Expiry Date & Quote Term cannot be empty.
